name: Extreme Crazy Dog Race 3D 2018
description:
Welcome to the Extreme Crazy Dog Race 3D 2018 in which you enjoy the race of greyhounds dogs.lets start the racing mania, your dog racing with stunt and jump adventures are just about to start. This Extreme Crazy Dog Race 3D 2018 game is a combination of dog racing, dog simulation and dog stunts.Start the challenge with modern new stunts of racing mania and become the champion of worldwide racing championship Dog racing stunts simulation and jumps over the hurdles is totally a new game with enhanced stunts and missions. Prepare your pet dog to participate in the mission and defeat other dogs with fast skills. Feel the real thrill and excitement of players participating in this crazy tournament.
These Dog racing tracks are designed for sprint racing and lap racing, on these dog racing tracks, the greyhounds are the favorites among the racing dogs, stray dogs are well trained by the dog trainers as controlling the racing dogs on the race tracks, enjoy this wonderful dog racing simulator game with dog stunts and jumps performance.
This is the newest dog racing and dog simulator game with the addition of different dog breeds like greyhounds, hounds, German Shepherd, Husky, Dalmatian, Bull Terrier, Bulldog Labrador, dachshund. Feel the thrill and excitement and enjoy the real dog derby.Bet for the best dog and win the race on a race day and win beat the odds.Get ready for the extreme pet doge race in off road world championship with new idea of crazy doggy race mania. It is a simulation of professional dogs that are very fast to compete other dogs. Enjoy the play with wonderful animations and 3D graphics to indulge the player to play this game. Realistic environment with amazing audience watching the real stunt dog race, you will be happy when your doggy wins the race against other high speed hounds. This racing game offers you an exciting gameplay with race and stunt modes. This game of dog racing stunt and jump emulates the realistic greyhound and other dog breed, dog racing excitement involved in dog racing and simulator games. Select race mode and help your dog finish the race with top ranks. In each level, you will be provided a specific challenge of jumping through certain obstacles

Extreme Crazy Dog Race 3D 2018 Features: 
- Fantastic and smooth game control.
- Full 3D Real Time rendering.
- Different new missions of simulator doggy.
- Cool graphics and animations.
- Excellent sound effects.
- Challenging and outstanding environment.
- Eye catching environment of simulation.
- Welcome to the dog derby.
- Stunning 3D Graphics.
- It is a free game available on app store.
